titles.title: Complete and Permanent Property Tax Deduction Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand and make permanent the standard deduction for real property taxes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/14/2009--Introduced. Complete and Permanent Property Tax Deduction Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) make permanent the standard tax deduction for real property taxes; and (2) repeal the dollar limitation on such deduction and the exclusion of foreign real property taxes.
